heading: SkillShot AB
preamble: We build dependable software and cloud platforms for airlines, banks and commerce brands.
mainBody:
SkillShot AB was started in 2016 by Hans Törnquist. We are a small team of senior engineers who plan architectures, build modern React front-ends, deliver Node.js and .NET backends, run services in Kubernetes and Azure, and automate releases with CI/CD. Most of our work happens inside airline and banking teams where uptime and compliance are non-negotiable. Customers bring us in when teams need extra hands or a calm partner for complex deliveries. We specialise in regulated industries where reliability, security and clear communication matter every day. Typical assignments include:
  • Rebuilding booking flows and disruption tools for airlines
  • Refreshing digital banking journeys and internal advisor portals
  • Adding observability, automation and performance guardrails to ageing platforms
If you want experienced engineers who understand regulated industries and deliver without fuss, SkillShot is ready to help.
